text: o visvasulara! Saitan adugu jadalalo nadavakandi. Mariyu evadu saitan adugujadalalo nadustado! Niscayanga saitan atanini aslilamaina mariyu asabhyakaramaina panulu ceyataniki protsahistadu mariyu mi yedala allah anugraham mariyu ayana karunaye lekunte, milo okkadu kuda nitimantuniga undaledu. Kani allah tanu korina vanini nitimantuniga cestadu. Mariyu allah sarvam vinevadu sarvajnudu
